package.name: iptables
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xzf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.gz fi
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" ./configure --sysconfdir=/etc --prefix=/usr --enable-devel CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" make -j $jobcount CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" else ./configure --sysconfdir=/etc --prefix=/usr --enable-devel make fi
